2327aad6-0a6e-480e-9c73-c11c40dfaf37.title: Zipline Pole
2327aad6-0a6e-480e-9c73-c11c40dfaf37.description: Ziplines can be connected between them. Connect them via the Connect Tool, or shoot them out of the Zipline Gun.

8450b872-b199-4c25-827a-34a48a4be4cf.description:
A part that can attach itself to ziplines.
Inputs:
-#df7f00Orange#919191: Attach/Detach
-#eeeeeeWhite#919191: Move forwards
-Black#919191: Move backwards
